title: Tasty Cheesy Chicken and Spinach Quesadilla Recipe
content:
Easy and healthy chicken spinach quesadillas which will be your kids favourite. This taste so good and makes a great lunch box dish.

Quesadilla is my favourite, it is nothing but any filling placed inside some tortilla along with cheese and toasted or grilled to perfection. So delicious and cheese. I have shared a few versions of quesadilla and this one is the simple one you could ever make.

 

Cheesy Chicken & Spinach Quesadillas

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 5 mins

Total time: 15 mins

 

Recipe type: Brunch

Cuisine: Mexican

Serves: 2 quesadillas

 

Ingredients

Leftover Chicken - 1 cups

Onion - 3 tablespoons chopped finely

Coriander Leaves - 3 tablespoons chopped finely

Chopped Spinach - 1 cup

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Cream Cheese or Cheese Spread - 2 tablespoons

Cheese Grated as needed

Chapati or Tortilla - 4

Oil - 1 teaspoon

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients except grated cheese and tortilla.

Spread on one tortilla and top with cheese. Place another tortilla on top and

Pan fry in little oil till golden on both sides.

Remove and cut it into pieces

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious hot and sour chicken soup with those thick udon noodles. It is so filling and is so delicious too. You can enjoy this soup on cold days.
 
Udon Chicken Noodles Soup Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 15 mins
Total time: 25 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Hand ( Pocket ) Pies Recipe
recommendations.content:
Super delicious chicken hand pie which is easy to make at home than buying from a shop. It will be a great appetizer or light lunch for any parties too.
 
Chicken Hand Pies Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 1 hour
Total time: 1 hour 10 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Broasted Chicken Recipe
Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
You
